column3: This might be out of scope for what you want to do with this PR, but I think if you're trying to fix initialization to guarantee insecure_rand has good entropy it may also be worth trying to fix the race conditions in insecure_rand (there are a few that I've looked at).\n

Not against this change, but I wouldn't suggest doing too much work for insecure_rand:\n- It's called insecure_rand because it shouldn't be used for anything requiring security, it shouldn't matter for its use case if it generates the same sequence every time. If anything does that is a bug.\n- One current goal is to replace replace the OpenSSL PRNG with built-in Fortuna implementation - as Fortun
